downloadTitle: Lync and Skype Audio Offloading of Digital Signal Processing Effects in Windows 8.1
downloadDescription: This white paper outlines the steps to be followed by providers of APO, driver-level, or firmware-level effects who would like Skype and Lync to use their processing by opening the audio stream in default mode.

downloadFile.name: Lync and Skype Audio Offloading of Digital Signal Processing Effects in Windows 8-1.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/7/c/1/7c1c33ec-748a-477d-b250-6d90a0e0aa08/Lync and Skype Audio Offloading of Digital Signal Processing Effects in Windows 8-1.pdf

detailsSection: This white paper outlines the steps to be followed by providers of APO, driver-level, or firmware-level effects who would like Skype and Lync to use their processing by opening the audio stream in default mode.
detailsSection_file_name: Lync and Skype Audio Offloading of Digital Signal Processing Effects in Windows 8-1.pdf

installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
